DB.name: Databases
DB.description: Database systems, data management, data storage, data retrieval, query optimization, and related topics.

Distributed.name: Distributed Systems
Distributed.description: Distributed computing, distributed algorithms, consensus protocols, fault tolerance, and related topics.

Parallel.name: Parallel Computing
Parallel.description: Parallel algorithms, parallel architectures, parallel programming models, and related topics.

Algorithms.name: Algorithms & Complexity
Algorithms.description: Algorithm design, analysis of algorithms, computational complexity, NP-completeness, and related topics.

DevOps.name: DevOps & Cloud
DevOps.description: Cloud computing, containerization, orchestration, CI/CD, infrastructure as code, and related topics.

Security.name: Security & Privacy
Security.description: Cryptography, network security, system security, privacy-preserving technologies, and related topics.

Systems.name: Systems & Networking
Systems.description: Operating systems, computer architecture, networking protocols, distributed systems, and related topics.

LeetCode.name: LeetCode
LeetCode.description: Coding problems and solutions from LeetCode, covering a wide range of topics and difficulty levels.

CodeForces.name: CodeForces
CodeForces.description: Competitive programming problems and solutions from CodeForces, covering various algorithms and data structures.

Other.name: Other
Other.description: Miscellaneous topics that don't fit into the other categories.
